Model.Name: Tutorial_2
Model.Description: This tutorial explains how to define Arrays (discrete distribution domains) and distributed parameters, how to calculate the number of degrees of freedom (NDOF) and how to fix it, and how to set initial guesses of the variables.

Object.Name: Q
Object.Description: Heat flux array at the edges of the plate (bottom/top), W/m2

Object.Name: λ
Object.Description: Thermal conductivity of the plate, W/mK

Object.Name: c_p
Object.Description: Specific heat capacity of the plate, J/kgK

Object.Name: HeatBalance
Object.Description: Heat balance equation. Valid on the open x and y domains

Object.Name: BC_bottom
Object.Description: Boundary conditions for the bottom edge

Object.Name: BC_top
Object.Description: Boundary conditions for the top edge

Object.Name: BC_left
Object.Description: Boundary conditions at the left edge

Object.Name: BC_right
Object.Description: Boundary conditions for the right edge

Object.Name: C_p
Object.Description: Equation to calculate the specific heat capacity of the plate as a function of the temperature.
